Choose one –
• Obscure the top two cards of your library [i](To obscure a card, exile it face down. You may play that card for as long as it remains exiled on a later turn.)[/i]
• Target creature gets -1/-3 until end of turn.
• Target noncreature artifact becomes a 3/3 construct creature in addition to its other types until end of turn.
